com.amazon.speech.ui

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.speech.ui.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkAccountCard, SimpleCard, StandardCard

    public abstract class Card
extends Object

    Base class for cards to display in the companion application.

    The common elements of all UI cards are laid out as follows:

    Title


    See Also:
    SpeechletResponse.setCard(Card)
